Tips for hand washing:
/circle6 Keep the soap bar in a soap dish and allow drainage.
/circle6 Always use running water to wash handsâ€”avoid dipping or washing your hands in a 
basin of standing water.
/circle6 Always use a separate towel or air dry your hands. Do not use shared towels to dry your 
hands. 
/circle6 Make sure that your nails are clipped short.
/circle6 Roll your sleeves up to the elbow before washing your hands.
